title: Tuesday Post Show Pre-Show (3-16-21)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show Pre-Show (3-16-21)
description:
Bobby on 47 million Americans will bet on March Madness this year and how it’s weird you can gamble in some states and not others. Mike D on the premise behind the ‘Yes Day’ movie. Bobby on how you can get a $1k steak at Salt Bae’s restaurant. Bobby also talks about getting on Clubhouse with the CEO of iHeart.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
